MessageContentFallback.not_decrypted_yet: This message is not decrypted yet

SpaceManage.subtitle: manage rooms
SpaceManage.private_rooms_message: Either the space contains private rooms or you need to join space to view it's rooms.

dialog.title: Remove avatar
dialog.description: Are you sure that you want to remove avatar?

follow_system.title: Follow system theme
follow_system.description: Use light or dark mode based on the system settings.

twitter_emoji.title: Use Twitter Emoji
twitter_emoji.description: Use Twitter emoji instead of system emoji.

newline.title: Use ENTER for Newline
newline.description: Use {{key}} + ENTER to send message and ENTER for newline.

markdown.title: Markdown formatting
markdown.description: Format messages with markdown before sending

hide_membership_events.title: Hide membership events
hide_membership_events.description: Hide membership change messages from room timeline. (Join, Leave, Invite, Kick and Ban)

hide_nickname_avatar_events.title: Hide nick/avatar events
hide_nickname_avatar_events.description: Hide nickname and avatar change messages from the room timeline.

media_autoload.title: Disable media auto load
media_autoload.description: Prevent images and videos from auto loading to save bandwidth.

url_preview.title: Url Preview
url_preview.description: Show url preview for link in messages.

url_preview_encrypted.title: Url Preview in Encrypted Room
url_preview_encrypted.description: Show url preview for link in encrypted messages.

show_hidden.title: Show hidden events
show_hidden.description: Show hidden state and message events.

desktop.title: Desktop notifications
desktop.description: Show desktop notifications when new messages arrive.

sound.title: Notification sound
sound.description: Play a sound when new messages arrive.

direct_messages.title: Direct messages
direct_messages.description: Default notification settings for all direct message.

encrypted_direct_messages.title: Encrypted direct messages
encrypted_direct_messages.description: Default notification settings for all encrypted direct message.

room_messages.title: Rooms messages
room_messages.description: Default notification settings for all room message.

encrypted_room_messages.title: Encrypted rooms messages
encrypted_room_messages.description: Default notification settings for all encrypted room message.

display_name.title: Message containing my display name
display_name.description: Default notification settings for all message containing your display name.

username.title: Message containing my username
username.description: Default notification settings for all message containing your username.

room.title: Message containing @room
room.description: Default notification settings for all messages containing @room.

keywords.title: Message containing keywords
keywords.description: Default notification settings for all message containing keywords.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Get notification when a message contains keyword.

ignored_users.headline: Ignored users
ignored_users.title: Ignore user
ignored_users.description: Ignore userId if you do not want to receive their messages or invites.

export_encryption_keys.title: Export E2E room keys
export_encryption_keys.description: Export end-to-end encryption room keys to decrypt old messages in other session. In order to encrypt keys you need to set a password, which will be used while importing.

import_encryption_keys.title: Import E2E room keys
import_encryption_keys.description: To decrypt older messages, Export E2EE room keys from Element (Settings > Security & Privacy > Encryption > Cryptography) and import them here. Imported keys are encrypted so you\'ll have to enter the password you set in order to decrypt it.

dialog.title: Logout
dialog.description: Are you sure that you want to logout your session?

credits.title: Credits
credits.matrix_js_sdk: The matrix-js-sdk is © The Matrix.org Foundation C.I.C used under the terms of Apache 2.0.

KeyBackup.restore_failed_bad_key: Failed to restore backup. Key is invalid!
KeyBackup.delete_key_backup_message: All encrypted message keys stored on the server will be permanently deleted.
KeyBackup.encrypted_messages_backup_description: Online backup your encrypted messages keys with your account data in case you lose access to your sessions. Your keys will be secured with a unique Security Key.
KeyBackup.encrypted_messages_backup_cross_signing_: Setup cross signing to backup your encrypted messages.

DeviceManage.setup_cross_signing_message: Setup cross signing in case you lose all your sessions
DeviceManage.logout_device_message: You are about to log out the session for {{device}}
DeviceManage.verify_this_session: Verify this session either with your Security Key/Phrase here or by initiating emoji verification from a verified session.
DeviceManage.verify_other_session: Verify other sessions by emoji verification or remove unfamiliar ones.
DeviceManage.session_name_privacy_message: Session names are visible to everyone, so do not put any private info here.

CrossSigning.title: Cross Signing
CrossSigning.setup_failed: Failed to setup cross signing. Please try again
CrossSigning.save_security_key_message: Please save this security key somewhere safe
CrossSigning.security_key_generation_message: We will generate a Security Key, which you can use to manage message backups and session verification.
CrossSigning.security_phrase_message: Alternatively you can set a 'Security Phrase' so you don't have to remember the long Security Key, and optionally save the key as a backup
CrossSigning.setup_message: Setup to verify and keep track of all your sessions. Also required to backup encrypted message.
CrossSigning.reset_keys_message: Anyone you have verified with will see security alerts and your message backup will lost. You almost certainly do not want to do this, unless you have lost Security Key or Phrase and every session you can cross-sign from.

RoomSettings.leave_room_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to leave {{room_name}}?
RoomSettings.notification_header: Notifications (Changing this will only affect you)

RoomCommon.drag_and_drop: Drag and drop files here or click for selection dialog

ProfileViewer.shared_power_message: You will not be able to undo this change as you are promoting the user to have the same power level as yourself. Are you sure?
ProfileViewer.demoting_self_message: You will not be able to undo this change as you are demoting yourself. Are you sure?

JoinAlias.couldnt_find_room_or_space_alias: Unable to find room/space with {{alias_name}}. Either the room/space is private or doesn't exist.
JoinAlias.couldnt_find_room_or_space: Unable to join {{alias_name}}. Either the room/space is private or doesn't exist.

EmojiVerification.confirmation_prompt: Confirm the emoji below are displayed on both devices, in the same order:
EmojiVerification.accept_request_from_other_device_message: Please accept the request from other device.
EmojiVerification.begin_verification_process_message: Click accept to start the verification process.

CreateRoom.select_who_can_join_space: Select who can join this space
CreateRoom.select_who_can_join_room: Select who can join this room
CreateRoom.e2e_message: You can’t disable this later. Bridges & most bots won’t work yet.
CreateRoom.role_message: Selecting 'Admin' sets your power level to 100 whereas 'Founder' sets it to 101.

RoomAliases.invalid_characters: Invalid character: only letter, numbers and _- are allowed.

publish_to_room_directory.title: Publish to room directory
publish_to_room_directory.publish_room_message: Publish this room to the {{homeserver}} publish directory?
publish_to_room_directory.publish_space_message: Publish this space to the {{homeserver}} publish directory?

published_addresses.title: Published addresses
published_addresses.no_main_address: No main address (select one from below)
published_addresses.message_room: Published addresses can be used by anyone on any server to join your room. To publish an address, it needs to be set as a local address first.
published_addresses.message_space: Published addresses can be used by anyone on any server to join your space. To publish an address, it needs to be set as a local address first.

local_addresses.title: Local addresses
local_addresses.message_room: Set local addresses for this room so users can find this room through your homeserver.
local_addresses.message_space: Set local addresses for this space so users can find this space through your homeserver.

RoomEncryption.encryption_public_room_message: It is not recommended to add encryption in public room. Anyone can find and join public rooms, so anyone should be able to read messages in them.
RoomEncryption.encryption_message: Once enabled, encryption for a room cannot be disabled. Messages sent in an encrypted room cannot be seen by the server, only by the participants of the room. Enabling encryption may prevent many bots and bridges from working correctly
RoomEncryption.encryption_cannot_be_disabled: Once enabled, encryption cannot be disabled.

RoomHistoryVisibility.changes_only_affect_future: Changes to history visibility will only apply to future messages. The visibility of existing history will have no effect.

leave.subtitle: Are you sure you want to leave the {{room_name}} room?

Auth.bad_localpart_error: Username can only contain characters a-z, 0-9, or '=_-./'

Auth.bad_password_error: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 non-alphanumeric character, 8-127 characters with no space.
